title: The Shaman's Song
description: A historical romance fiction. Novella.When an attack over-turns a wagon killing the Martins, their six year old daughter Avery learns to survive in the Smokey Mountains by watching the bears. Avery learns to adapt and to trust until the Shaman's Song changes her life's path and sends her away from the boy who saved her and captivated her child heart.Panther has always loved his God girl but to protect her he must betray her. Will the song heal her heart and bring her back with forgiveness? Will Avery the woman learn to love Panther the man?
author: Elle Marlow
